sentences.sContent: All you see on TV is sex and violence these days.
sentences.sCn: 如今在电视上看到的尽是性和暴力。

sentences.sContent: They had sex in the back seat of his car.
sentences.sCn: 他们在他的汽车后座上做了爱。

sentences.sContent: She no longer wanted to have sex with him.
sentences.sCn: 她再也不想和他做爱了。

trans.tranOther: the physical activity that two people do together in order to produce babies, or for pleasure
